entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
